page.title: 06LION YARD SHOPPING CENTRE
page.content: THE HUSTLE AND BUSTLE OF THE UNDERCOVER SHOPPING CENTRE. IN THE CENTRE STANDS A TWO METRE RED LION STATUE ABOUT THREE METRES OFF THE GROUND. THERE ARE MANY DIFFERENT SHOPS IN THE CENTRE RANGIING FROM RESTAURANTS TO EARLY LEARNING CENTRES. THERE ARE BALCONYS LEADING TO THE COURTS AND TO W H SMITHS. ON ONE OF THE BALCONYS TEENAGERS BREAKDANCE AND GYRATE TO A COCOPHONY OF SOUND WHICH IS COMING FROM THEIR STEREOS. ALSO IN LION YARD THERE IS THE CENTRAL LIBRARY WHICH NOW LENDS VIDEOS. BY THE RED LION, STAND BUSKERS PLAYING THEIR INSTRUMENTS HOPING FOR SOMEONE TO DROP PENNIES IN THEIR CASES. THERE ARE TRAMPS AND DRUNKARDS "DOSSING" AROUND DRINKING BEER AND THERE IS EVEN A TRAMP LAYING ON A BENCH COVERED IN NEWSPAPER.THERE ARE ALSO A LOT OF SHOPPERS.LION YARD IS A BUSY PLACE.
